exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
In environment A : Type R1, R2 : rel A A H : forall x : A, R2 x x x : A Unable to unify "R2 ?M1511 ?M1511" with "R1 x x \\/ R2 x x".

original: intros. unfold Reflexive, rel_union. intros. intros x. destruct H. - unfold Reflexive in H. apply H. - unfold Reflexive in H0. apply H0.
